channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Volume Manager Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Volume Manager Driver

item.title: CVE-2017-8668|2024-09-16T17:49:30.833Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- volume%20manager%20driver
item.description: The Volume Manager Extension Driver in Microsoft Windows 7 SP1, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 8.1 and Windows RT 8.1, Windows Server 2012 and R2 allows an attacker to run a specially crafted application and obtain kernel information, aka "Volume Manager Extension Driver Information Disclosure Vulnerability".
